programme.title: George Clarke's Old House, New Home
programme.desc: George returns to help more people unlock the potential of their homes. He begins with a family home suffering from a mass of 1970s panelling and an indestructible cement staircase.

programme.title: The Split
programme.desc: Hannah and Nathan have a fight about the events that took place the night before their wedding. Her confession puts their marriage in turmoil and he leaves her, temporarily staying with Rose and James. Considering the Hansen case, Hannah suggests generating the bad press around Richie, assuring...

programme.title: SOS solidarité : opération rénovation
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the team help Simon Dobbin in Mildenhall, Suffolk - a loving father, husband and football fan whose life was changed when he was attacked in March 2015.

programme.title: Still Open All Hours
programme.desc: Granville announces he has a special way of matching the right product to the right customer. Madge and Mavis are going to a wedding dressed very glamurous, and Granville gets concerned that Mavis might attract some new admirers. Eric, Cyril and Mr Newbold discuss their emotional relationships,...

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle returns to meet his previous contributors who set up home in remote locations. In this episode he returns to Fair Isle, an island in Shetland in northern Scotland, where Tommy Hindman lives.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
programme.desc: Presenter Claudia Winkleman challenges the nine amateurs to make a babygrow from stretchy fabric, transform a bridesmaid dress into an outfit for a boy or girl, and create woollen capes using child models.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Quiz show in which the 30 contestants competing across the series must avoid giving impossible answers to give themselves a chance of winning £10,000.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: The reds and the blues are tracking down bargains at Epsom Downs racecourse in Surrey, with experts Caroline Hawley and Ochuko Ojiri on hand.

programme.title: SOS solidarité : opération rénovation
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the DIY SOS team attempt to build a two-storey flexible-use centre that can be used by the Grenfell community however it decides.

programme.title: Mister Winner
programme.desc: It's Leslie's stag do and the gang are off kayaking. But when Leslie suggests a short cut, things literally take an unexpected turn.
